name: Constituent Components
author: Volt Cruelerz
description: Improves the roster of ship components.

name: Greedy Gauss Mod
author: MadPhoenix -> Volt Cruelerz
description: Expands the effects of Gauss research to everything using Gauss weapons.

name: Kol Options
author: Volt Cruelerz
description: Fusillade and Adaptive Force Field are no longer terrible.

name: Krosov Nukes & Prova PD
author: Volt Cruelerz
description: Adds S2S missiles to Krosov and a PD gun to Prova.

name: Point Defense Strings
author: Volt Cruelerz
description: PD guns now fire much faster, yielding the iconic string look of actual point defense guns. This also prevents the silliness of seeming to shoot at dead missiles. Additionally, disambiguates classes of point defense between attack (A) and defense (D)

name: Planet Loyalty
author: Visual39 & Volt Cruelerz
description: Planets now have a Loyalty bar instead of a Health bar.

name: Gauss Mod 1.1
author: MadPhoenix
description: Expands the effects of Gauss research to everything using Gauss weapons.
